WorkItem.Description:
Using 'Load Character from Battle.net' fails with character Homerekka (Bloodhoof-EU).  If I remove Reinforced Bio-Optic killshades and Cloudburst Ring of the Landslide, then the lookup works.
 
I've tried adding the item manually, using the item browser, which seems to work but then when clicking the head-slot to add the item, Rawr hangs.
 
Is there a workaround for this issue?
WorkItem.Summary: Error Loading Particular Items from Battle.net

Comments.Message: We are releasing a new version tonight or tomorrow sometime. Once that is released try this again. We are using the new API import feature released by Blizzard.
Thanks.  The new release fixed this issue.
